review_data.title: I expected a bit more...
review_data.content: When you enter this place the smell is very good. the service is not great, they really don't care. My raclette was good but not the best... It was very busy, I will try to come an other time next year.

review_data.title: great for fondue
review_data.content: Our family was in Zurich for New Years eve 2015 and knew everything would be booked for dinner. The manager of Adler advised us we could dine at 6pm but must leave by 7:30 as everything was reserved. We were very grateful and it worked...More

review_data.title: Perfeito
review_data.content: Restaurante para comer raclette e foundue. Bem concorrido,pois a comida é típica e bem gostosa. Super recomendo.
